name: Concealed Cavity
shortContent: The character can store one small item in a small compartment in their own body.
content:
The character's flesh or augmetics conceals a small
compartment. This might be a pouch hidden under a flap
of flesh or a chamber fitted into a cybernetic enhancement.
The character may conceal one small item, no larger than a
closed fist, within this cavity. Discovering this compartment
requires success on a Difficult (-10) Search Test. If using
a medicae scanner or auspex, the Difficulty is reduced to
Ordinary (+10).
